00017 template<
00018   class STRING_TYPE = string,
00019   uint64_t CACHE_LENGTH = 100000000,//bytes
00020   uint32_t BUCKET_SIZE = 8192,//byte
00021   uint8_t SPLIT_RATIO = 75,
00022   class CacheType = CachePolicyLARU,
00023   typename STRING_TYPE::value_type* ALPHABET = a2z,
00024   uint32_t ALPHABET_SIZE = a2z_size
00025   >
00026 class BucketCache
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   typedef Bucket<STRING_TYPE, BUCKET_SIZE, SPLIT_RATIO,ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> NodeType;
00030 
00031 protected:
00032   struct _cache_node_
00033   {
00034     CacheType cacheInfo_;
00035     NodeType* pNode_;
00036     bool locked_;
00037 
00038     inline _cache_node_(NodeType* p)
00039     {
00040       pNode_ = p;
00041       locked_ = false;
00042     }
00043     inline _cache_node_()
00044     {
00045       pNode_ = NULL;
00046       locked_ = false;
00047     }
00048     
00049     
00050   }
00051     ;
00052 #define CACHE_SIZE (CACHE_LENGTH/(sizeof(struct _cache_node_)+NodeType::SIZE_)) 
00053   
00054   
00055 public:
00056   typedef BucketCache <STRING_TYPE, CACHE_LENGTH,BUCKET_SIZE, SPLIT_RATIO, CacheType, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> SelfType;
00057   
00058   class nodePtr
00059   {
00060   public:
00061     nodePtr()
00062     {      
00063       pN_ = NULL;
00064       pC_ = NULL;
00065       idx_ = (uint32_t)-1;
00066     }
00067     
00068     nodePtr(struct _cache_node_& n, uint32_t idx)
00069     {
00070       pN_ = n.pNode_;
00071       pC_ = &n.cacheInfo_;
00072       idx_ = idx;
00073     }
00074     
00075     NodeType* operator ->()
00076     {
00077       pC_->visit();
00078       if (pN_ ==NULL)
00079         cout<<"Node is not exist!\n";//Throw exception
00080       return pN_;
00081     }
00082 
00083     void eleminate()
00084     {
00085       if (pN_ != NULL)
00086         delete pN_;
00087 
00088       pN_ = NULL;
00089     }
00090     
00091     uint32_t getIndex() const
00092     {
00093       return idx_;
00094     }
00095 
00096     bool isNull()const
00097     {
00098       return pN_==NULL;
00099     }
00100     
00101 
00102     NodeType* pN_;
00103   protected:
00104     CacheType* pC_;
00105     uint32_t idx_;
00106   }
00107     ;
00108   
00109   BucketCache(FILE* f)
00110     :f_(f),count_(0)
00111   {
00112     //cout<<NodeType::SIZE_ <<"////"<<(CACHE_LENGTH)<<"///"<<CACHE_SIZE<<endl;
00113     nodes  = new struct _cache_node_[CACHE_SIZE];
00114   }
00115 
00116   ~BucketCache()
00117   {
00118     for (uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00119       if (nodes[i].pNode_ != NULL)
00120       {
00121         delete nodes[i].pNode_;
00122         nodes[i].pNode_ = NULL;
00123       }
00124     delete nodes;
00125   }
00126   
00127   uint32_t load()
00128   {
00129     return count_;
00130   }
00131   
00132   uint32_t reload()
00133   {
00134     for(uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00135     {
00136       if (nodes[i].pNode_ != NULL)
00137       {
00138         delete nodes[i].pNode_;
00139         nodes[i].pNode_ = NULL;
00140       }
00141       
00142     }
00143     count_ = 0;
00144     
00145     return load();
00146   }
00147   
00148 
00149 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const SelfType& node)
00150   {
00151     for(uint32_t i=0; i<node.count_; i++)
00152     {
00153       os<<"\n****************"<<i<<"****************\n";
00154       if (node.nodes[i].pNode_==NULL)
00155         continue;
00156       os<<node.nodes[i].cacheInfo_;
00157       os<<*node.nodes[i].pNode_;
00158     }
00159 
00160     return os;
00161     
00162   }
00163 
00167   uint32_t findSwitchOut() const
00168   {
00169     uint32_t minIdx = 0;
00170     while(minIdx<count_ && nodes[minIdx].locked_)
00171       minIdx++;
00172     if (minIdx==count_)
00173       cout<<"All bucket locked up, Why?\n";
00174     
00175     for (uint32_t i=minIdx+1; i<count_; i++)
00176     {
00177       if (nodes[i].pNode_==NULL)
00178         return i;
00179       
00180       if ((!nodes[i].locked_) && nodes[i].cacheInfo_.compare(nodes[minIdx].cacheInfo_)<0)
00181       {
00182         minIdx = i;
00183       }
00184       
00185     }
00186 
00187     //if (minIdx == 0)
00188     // LDBG_<<"Bucket cache is full. Can't find one to switch out";
00189     
00190     return minIdx;
00191   }
00192 
00193   uint32_t getCount()const
00194   {
00195     return count_;
00196   }
00197 
00201   uint32_t findInCache(uint64_t diskAddr)
00202   {
00203     for (uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00204     {
00205       if (nodes[i].pNode_ == NULL)
00206         continue;
00207 
00208       if(nodes[i].pNode_->getDiskAddr()== diskAddr)
00209         return i;
00210     }
00211 
00212     return -1;
00213     
00214   }
00215 
00219   nodePtr getNodeByMemAddrForLoading(uint32_t& memAddr, uint64_t diskAddr)
00220   {    
00221     if (diskAddr%2==1)
00222       return nodePtr();
00223     
00224     if (memAddr>=count_ && memAddr!=(uint32_t)-1&&count_!=0)
00225       return nodePtr();
00226 
00227     if (memAddr!=(uint32_t)-1)
00228     {
00229       NodeType* t = nodes[memAddr].pNode_;
00230       if (t->getDiskAddr()==diskAddr)
00231       {
00232         return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00233       }
00234     }
00235     
00236     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00237     {
00238       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00239       t->load(diskAddr);
00240       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00241       
00242       memAddr = count_;
00243       
00244       count_++;
00245       return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00246     }
00247 
00248     //cout<< "getNodeByMemAddr()\n";
00249 
00250     memAddr = findSwitchOut();
00251     cout<<"\nswitch out-: "<<memAddr<<endl;
00252     kickOutNodes(memAddr);
00253     
00254     
00255     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00256     t->load(diskAddr);
00257     nodes[memAddr] = _cache_node_(t);
00258     return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00259   }
00260 
00264   nodePtr getNodeByMemAddr(uint32_t& memAddr, uint64_t diskAddr)
00265   {    
00266     if (diskAddr%2==1)
00267       return nodePtr();
00268     
00269     if (memAddr>=count_ && memAddr!=(uint32_t)-1&&count_!=0)
00270       return nodePtr();
00271 
00272     if (memAddr!=(uint32_t)-1)
00273     {
00274       NodeType* t = nodes[memAddr].pNode_;
00275       if (t->getDiskAddr()==diskAddr)
00276       {
00277         return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00278       }
00279     }
00280 
00281     uint32_t i = findInCache(diskAddr);
00282     if (i != (uint32_t)-1)
00283     {
00284       memAddr = i;
00285       return nodePtr(nodes[i], memAddr);
00286     }
00287     
00288     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00289     {
00290       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00291       t->load(diskAddr);
00292       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00293       
00294       memAddr = count_;
00295       
00296       count_++;
00297       return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00298     }
00299 
00300     //cout<< "getNodeByMemAddr()\n";
00301 
00302     memAddr = findSwitchOut();
00303     //cout<<"\nswitch out-: "<<memAddr<<endl;
00304     kickOutNodes(memAddr);
00305     
00306     
00307     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00308     t->load(diskAddr);
00309     nodes[memAddr] = _cache_node_(t);
00310     return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00311   }
00312 
00316   void lockNode(uint32_t memAddr)
00317   {
00318     nodes[memAddr].locked_ = true;
00319   }
00320 
00324   void unlockNode(uint32_t memAddr)
00325   {
00326     nodes[memAddr].locked_ = false;
00327   }
00328 
00332   nodePtr newNode(uint64_t diskAddr)
00333   {
00334     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00335     {
00336       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00337       t->load(diskAddr);
00338       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00339       nodePtr p(nodes[count_]);
00340       count_++;
00341       return p;
00342     }
00343 
00344     
00345     uint32_t ret = findSwitchOut();
00346     kickOutNodes(ret);
00347     
00348     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00349     t->load(diskAddr);
00350     nodes[ret] = _cache_node_(t);
00351     nodePtr p(nodes[ret]);
00352     return p;
00353   }
00354 
00358   nodePtr newNode()
00359   {
00360     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00361     {
00362       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00363       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00364       nodePtr p(nodes[count_], count_);
00365       count_++;
00366       return p;
00367     }
00368 
00369     //cout<<"-------\n";
00370     uint32_t ret = findSwitchOut();
00371     
00372     kickOutNodes(ret);
00373 
00374     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00375     
00376     nodes[ret] = _cache_node_(t);
00377     nodePtr p(nodes[ret], ret);
00378     return p;
00379 
00380   }
00381 
00385   uint64_t kickOutNodes(uint32_t memAddr)
00386   {
00387     //cout<<"Kick out bucket: "<<memAddr<<" "<<count_;
00388     
00389     if (memAddr==(uint32_t)-1 || nodes[memAddr].pNode_ == NULL)
00390       return (uint64_t)-1;
00391 
00392     uint64_t ret = nodes[memAddr].pNode_->update2disk();
00393     //cout<<nodes[memAddr].cacheInfo_;
00394     //cout<<nodes[memAddr-1].cacheInfo_;
00395     //cout<<nodes[memAddr+1].cacheInfo_;
00396     delete nodes[memAddr].pNode_;
00397     nodes[memAddr]=  _cache_node_(NULL);
00398 
00399     return ret;
00400   }
00401 
00405   void flush()
00406   {
00407     for (uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00408       if (nodes[i].pNode_ != NULL)
00409         nodes[i].pNode_->update2disk();
00410     fflush(f_);
00411   }
00412 
00413   bool isFull()
00414   {
00415     return count_ >= CACHE_SIZE;
00416   }
00417

00419   FILE* f_;
